Package com.tiyb.tev.controller

Class TEVConvoRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tiyb.tev.controller.TEVConvoRestController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/api")
public class TEVConvoRestController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for working with Conversations.

    tiyb

      • getAllConversations

public java.util.List<Conversation> getAllConversations()

      • getConversationById

public Conversation getConversationById​(@PathVariable("id")
                                        java.lang.Long conversationID)
        GET to return a single conversation, by ID

        Returns:

      • getConversationByParticipant

        @GetMapping("/conversations/{participantName}")
public Conversation getConversationByParticipant​(@RequestParam("participantName")
                                                 java.lang.String participantName)
        GET to return a single conversation, by participant name
        Parameters:
        participantName - Name of the participant
        Returns:
        Single Conversation

      • getConversationByParticipantIdOrName

        @GetMapping("/conversations/id/{participantId}/{participantName}")
public Conversation getConversationByParticipantIdOrName​(@RequestParam("participantId")
                                                         java.lang.String participantId,
                                                         @RequestParam("participantName")
                                                         java.lang.String participantName)
        GET to return a single conversation by participant ID. Because some conversations (where all messages are from the main blog and none are from the participant) will have no conversation ID, a backup method is provided whereby conversations can be searched by Participant Name instead of ID. So if the initial search (by Participant ID) returns no results, a secondary search (by Participant name) will be attempted
        Parameters:
        participantId - ID of the participant
        participantName - Name of the participant; not used if ID is successfully used to retrieve a Conversation
        Returns:
        Single Conversation

      • getUnhiddenConversations

        @GetMapping("/conversations/unhidden")
public java.util.List<Conversation> getUnhiddenConversations()
        Returns all conversations that are not set to "hidden" status
        Returns:
        List of conversations

      • getHiddenConversations

        @GetMapping("/conversations/hidden")
public java.util.List<Conversation> getHiddenConversations()
        Returns all conversations that are set to "hidden" status. Not used by TEV, but included for the sake of completeness.
        Returns:
        List of conversations

      • createConversation

        @PostMapping("/conversations")
public Conversation createConversation​(@Valid @RequestBody
                                       @Valid Conversation conversation)
        POST request to submit a conversation into the system
        Parameters:
        conversation - The conversation object (in JSON format) to be saved into the database
        Returns:
        The same object that was saved (including the generated ID)

      • updateConversation

        @PutMapping("/conversations/{id}")
public Conversation updateConversation​(@PathVariable("id")
                                       java.lang.Long conversationId,
                                       @RequestBody
                                       Conversation convoDetails)
        PUT to update a conversation
        Parameters:
        conversationId - ID of the convo to be updated
        convoDetails - Details to be inserted into the DB
        Returns:
        The updated Conversation details

      • ignoreConversation

public Conversation ignoreConversation​(@PathVariable("participant")
                                       java.lang.String participantName)
        Sets a conversation to "ignored" status
        Parameters:
        participantName - Name of the participant in the conversation to be ignored
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The object that was just submitted (with ID)

      • updateConvoMsg

                                          @RequestBody
                                          ConversationMessage convoMsg)
        PUT to update a conversation message
        Parameters:
        msgId - The ID of the message to be updated
        convoMsg - The updated data
        Returns:
        The same data that was just submitted
